title: Deads Ultimate Boot 2015-08-10
description:
Deads Ultimate Boot 2015-08-10


Table of Contents
==================
1) A word from the author
2) Installation
3) Windows PE
4) ISO images
5) Portable apps
6) Expand Deads Ultimate Boot
7) Release notes

=========================
1) A word from the author
=========================

word.

===============
2) Installation
===============

 o extract zip file contents to root directory of an USB stick/drive or any SSD/HDD
 o modify the drive-letter in "/multiboot/install_syslinux.cmd" accordingly (find the comment)
 o execute "/multiboot/install_syslinux.cmd" (CAUTION! any previous bootloader (if any) on the partition will be overwritten!)

=============
3) Windows PE
=============

o Based on "Windows 10 RTM Build 10240"
o Created with Win10PE SE --> http://win10se.cwcodes.net/
o x86 only because WoW64 for x64 is not yet supported by Win10PE SE
o Incuded:
  o NVIDIA Driver 353.62
  o AMD Catalyst Driver 15.7.1
  o Intel HD Graphics Driver 153338
  o DirectX 9
  o DirectX 11
  o Visual C++ runtimes: 2005, 2008, 2010, 2012, 2013

=============
4) ISO images
=============

o Kali Linux (kali-linux-1.1.0a-amd64)
o Parted Magic (pmagic_2015_03_06)
o Ultimate Boot CD (ubcd533)

(Feel free to install any many more apps, they are persited on the drive)

=============================
6) Expand Deads Ultimate Boot
=============================
 o Syslinux is used as bootmanager, configuration is at "/multiboot/syslinux.cfg"
 o ISO images are stored under "/multiboot/ISO/", check out that folder for more .txt files
 o Windows image is at "/sources/boot.wim"
 o "/PecmdExt.ini" starts the startup batchfile
 o The startup batchfile aswell as the corresponding data files are located under "/Boot/startup/"
 o You should not delete the "/Boot", "/efi", "/multiboot" or /sources folders unless you know what you are doing
 o None of the files in the root are redunand, except for this one - in case you've already memorized it

================
